newsitem.title: USA: IDX Systems options to trade on AMEX.
newsitem.headline: IDX Systems options to trade on AMEX.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange will trade options on the stock of IDX Systems Corp beginning July 17, the exchange said Friday.
IDX Systems, based in Burlington, Vermont, provides health care information systems to medical centers and physician groups.

The options, using the symbol XQW, will open with strike prices of 30, 35 and 40. Positions will be limited to 4,500 contracts. Initial expiration months will be August, September and November 1997 and February 1998.
Susquehanna Investment Group will be the specialist unit for the options, AMEX said.
